name: Castle Defense: Wizards vs Robots
description:
Truly Epic Battle! Kill all the Robots and Bosses! Be a Wizard of War!

Protect Your Castle!

Upgrade Your Skills!

Magic Spells: FireBall, Lightning, Fire Line, Ice and Transformation to Chicken :)

Stop the Crazy Professor and his unbeatable Army of Robots!

Important:
- Free Gems every day
- Incredible graphics and music
- Best time killer ever
